text: Langen bei Bremerhaven is a town and a former municipality in Cuxhaven in Lower Saxony, Germany. Since 1 January 2015, it is part of the town of Geestland. It is about 7 km north of the centre of Bremerhaven and 30 km south of Cuxhaven. == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Lower Saxony Category:Former municipalities in Lower Saxony Category:Geestland
title: Langen, Cuxhaven
